title: IndieLeap Platform: Proposed Technology Stack
description: Comprehensive technology stack documentation for the IndieLeap platform, detailing the chosen technologies, architecture, and implementation approach across frontend, backend, database, AI integration, and infrastructure components.
author: William Roberts
preview: This document defines and justifies the recommended technology stack for the IndieLeap platform. The objective is to establish a comprehensive, scalable, and future-proof foundation centered on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Firebase services.
